name: YusnaTalk
_source: s;Yusna;Some say that a god's temple reflects the health of their community.{w}{br}I never bought that myself, however this is... impressive.
s;Simon;Think the tiles are solid gold?
s;Simon;Hah, I doubt it.{w} But I agree, this is impressive.
s;Yusna;Simon... don't trust what Clotho tells you.
s;Yusna;The Fates claim to have power over time itself.
s;Simon;And you doubt that?{w} Yusna, you know that I have their blessing.
s;Yusna;Luther asked for my advice.{w}{br}Trust me, I've thought a lot about this.
s;Yusna;I think that they have some power over time.{w}{br}But you should not trust most gods.
s;Simon;Even ones who have given you their blessing?

s;Yusna;Especially those.{w} Just because you have their blessing,{w}{br}doesn't mean they can control you.{w}{br}They can't revoke a blessing,{w}{br}meaning they're desperate to keep you under control.
s;Simon;...I see. You've given me a lot to think about.
